title: LUFFY'S MOST POWERFUL TRANSFORMATION! AFRO LUFFY! One Piece Episode 217 Reaction
author: JennAnime
description: A reaction video to One Piece Episode 217 featuring Afro Luffy's debut and the beginning of the Combat round against Foxy.

title: One Piece Episode 217 Blind Reaction - AFRO LUFFY!
author: Unknown
description: A blind reaction to Episode 217, capturing first-time viewer reactions to Afro Luffy and the Combat round.

title: Afro Luffy: Unforgettable Davy Back Fight
author: ToonW Editorial
description: An in-depth article analyzing Afro Luffy as a cultural moment in One Piece, discussing its significance, fan reception, and the symbolism of the afro in relation to boxing champions like Muhammad Ali.

title: One Piece - Davy Back Fight Arc Recap
author: TV Tropes Contributors
description: A comprehensive recap of the entire Davy Back Fight arc, including analysis of Episode 217's Combat round and Afro Luffy moment.

title: One Piece Diaries #26: 'Davy Back Fight' Arc
author: First-time watcher
description: A first-time viewer's diary entries covering their experience watching the Davy Back Fight arc, including reactions to Afro Luffy and the Combat round.

title: One Piece: Davy Back Fights, Explained
author: CBR Staff
description: An explainer article detailing the rules, history, and significance of Davy Back Fights in the One Piece world, with specific focus on the Combat round featured in Episode 217.

title: One Piece: Long Ring Long Land Arc - Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial
description: A comprehensive summary and review of the Long Ring Long Land arc, including detailed analysis of the Combat round and why Afro Luffy resonates with fans.

title: One Piece's Most Hated Story Was Actually Ruined By The Anime
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: An analysis article discussing how the anime adaptation extended the Long Ring Long Land arc with filler content, and how this affected fan reception. Includes discussion of the Combat round.

title: One Piece Episode 217-219 Reaction/Review
author: SprinkleVerse
description: A reaction and review video covering Episodes 217-219, including the Combat round between Luffy and Foxy.

title: The Noro Noro no Mi's Time-Bending Secrets
author: Game Rant Staff
description: An analysis of the Noro Noro no Mi Devil Fruit, its abilities, and how Foxy uses it tactically in battle. Discusses techniques shown in Episode 217 including Kyubi Rush.
